verses.verse: And there was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and of their <S%H802>wives<s%> against their <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>.

For there <S%H3426>were<s%> that <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1121>We<s%>, our sons, and our <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, are <S%H7227>many<s%>: therefore we take <S%H3947>up<s%> <S%H1715>corn<s%> for <S%H398>them<s%>, that we may eat, and <S%H2421>live<s%>.

Some also there <S%H3426>were<s%> that <S%H559>said<s%>, We have <S%H6148>mortgaged<s%> our <S%H7704>lands<s%>, <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and <S%H1004>houses<s%>, that we might <S%H3947>buy<s%> <S%H1715>corn<s%>, because of the <S%H7458>famine<s%>.

Yet now our <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is as the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of our <S%H251>brothers<s%>, our <S%H1121>sons<s%> as their <S%H1121>sons<s%>: <S%H3533>and<s%>, behold, we bring into bondage our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to be <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and some of our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H3426>are<s%> brought unto <S%H3533>bondage<s%> <S%H410>already<s%>: neither is it in our power to redeem <S%H312>them<s%>; for other men have our <S%H7704>lands<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>.
And I was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry<s%> when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H2201>cry<s%> and these <S%H1697>words<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1767>them<s%>, We after our ability have <S%H7069>redeemed<s%> our <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, which were <S%H4376>sold<s%> unto the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>; and will you even <S%H4376>sell<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%>? or shall they be <S%H4376>sold<s%> unto <S%H2790>us<s%>? Then held they their peace, and <S%H4672>found<s%> nothing to <S%H1697>answer<s%>.

Also I <S%H559>said<s%>, It is not <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>that<s%> you <S%H6213>do<s%>: should you not <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> because of the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> our <S%H341>enemies<s%>?

I <S%H251>likewise<s%>, and my brothers, and my <S%H5288>servants<s%>, might <S%H5383>lend<s%> them <S%H3701>money<s%> and <S%H1715>corn<s%>: I pray <S%H5800>you<s%>, let us leave off this <S%H4855>usury<s%>.

<S%H7725>Restore<s%>, I pray <S%H3117>you<s%>, to them, even this day, their <S%H7704>lands<s%>, their <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, their <S%H2132>oliveyards<s%>, and their <S%H1004>houses<s%>, also the <S%H3967>hundredth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money<s%>, and of the <S%H1715>corn<s%>, the <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and the <S%H3323>oil<s%>, that you exact of <S%H5383>them<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7725>they<s%>, We will restore <S%H1245>them<s%>, and will require nothing of <S%H6213>them<s%>; so will we do as you <S%H559>say<s%>. Then I <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and took an <S%H7650>oath<s%> of <S%H6213>them<s%>, that they should do according to this <S%H1697>promise<s%>.

Also I <S%H5287>shook<s%> my <S%H2684>lap<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, So <S%H430>God<s%> shake <S%H5287>out<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and from his <S%H3018>labor<s%>, that <S%H6965>performs<s%> not this <S%H1697>promise<s%>, even thus be he shaken <S%H5287>out<s%>, and <S%H7386>emptied<s%>. And all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>, and <S%H1984>praised<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to this <S%H1697>promise<s%>.

Moreover from the <S%H3117>time<s%> that I was <S%H6680>appointed<s%> to be their <S%H6346>governor<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, from the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> even unto the <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, that <S%H8147>is<s%>, twelve <S%H8141>years<s%>, I and my <S%H251>brothers<s%> have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6346>governor<s%>.

But the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> that had been <S%H6440>before<s%> me were <S%H3513>chargeable<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and had <S%H3947>taken<s%> of them <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%>, <S%H310>beside<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>; <S%H1571>Yes<s%>, even their <S%H5288>servants<s%> bore <S%H7980>rule<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%>: but so <S%H6213>did<s%> not <S%H6440>I<s%>, because of the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H2388>Yes<s%>, also I continued in the <S%H4399>work<s%> of this <S%H2346>wall<s%>, neither <S%H7069>bought<s%> we any <S%H7704>land<s%>: and all my <S%H5288>servants<s%> were <S%H6908>gathered<s%> there unto the <S%H4399>work<s%>.

Moreover there were at my <S%H7979>table<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers<s%>, beside those that <S%H935>came<s%> unto us from among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that are about <S%H5439>us<s%>.

Now that which was <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for me <S%H3117>daily<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7794>ox<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1305>choice<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>; also <S%H6833>birds<s%> were <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for <S%H6235>me<s%>, and once in ten <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H7235>store<s%> of all sorts of <S%H3196>wine<s%>: yet for <S%H5973>all<s%> this <S%H1245>required<s%> not I the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6346>governor<s%>, because the <S%H5656>bondage<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> upon this <S%H5971>people<s%>.
<S%H2142>Think<s%> upon <S%H430>me<s%>, my God, for <S%H2896>good<s%>, according to all that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> for this <S%H5971>people<s%>.
